game.name: Eufloria HD
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience the celebrated strategy gameplay of Eufloria HD. Conquer asteroids in space and use their resources to grow floral creatures that do your bidding. Expand your empire and fight against several teams of AI opponents that all vie for the same resources and can offer fierce opposition.
